description: Enterprise techniques used by WINERACK, ATT&CK software S0219 (v1.0)
name: WINERACK (S0219)

techniques.comment: [WINERACK](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0219) can enumerate active windows.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)

[WINERACK](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0219) can create a reverse shell that utilizes statically-linked Wine cmd.exe code to emulate Windows command prompt commands.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)
[WINERACK](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0219) can enumerate files and directories.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)
[WINERACK](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0219) can enumerate processes.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)
[WINERACK](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0219) can gather information about the host.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)
[WINERACK](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0219) can gather information on the victim username.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)
[WINERACK](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0219) can enumerate services.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)
